DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Concurrent Review Route For Signature Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the concurrence review was routed to the primary reviewer/committee chair for signature.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Concurrent Review Route For Signature
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to writing that contains information regarding research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research and the agreement occurring at the same time upon the act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :A writing that contains information.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring or operating at the same time.:The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.:A method of achieving something. (from Cambridge Advanced Learner's Dictionary - online):No Value Exists:Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; an identifying feature or characteristic of something or someone; an alternative term for motif or pattern; the part of the prescription that contains directions to the patient for taking of medicine.

Concepts.definition: Occurring or operating at the same time.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.
A way of getting from one place to another; an established line of travel or access; the way a chemical or pollutant enters an organism after contact, particularly, the way of drug administration.
Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; having a handwritten signature.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
